attributes.action: Consider a scheme of performance related pay for Social Workers and their Managers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Regularly ask service users to complete a quality assessment form to say whether the service from their social worker has been satisfactory and effective.

Or when a case is closed for an assessment to be made on the quality and effectiveness of the social worker.
Will the Prime Minister consider introduce Performance Related  Pay for Social Workers and their managers. please?
